archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0885
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Revenue Assurance Analyst I want be able access all provisioning, billing and sales data so that we can ensure all customers have been provisioned with the correct products and services and in a timely manner

properties.value: Is it about access to CRM system of Comarch? Kiri: Yes, so access to system aswell as ability to run queries

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
